description: A refreshing and light noodle dish, packed with fresh flavours.
keywords: Soba Noodle Salad with Radish, Mint & Avocado
name: Soba Noodle Salad with Radish, Mint & Avocado Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the radish and continue to fry for a further 1 minute. Serve the hot noodles with the sliced avocado and torn mint and some balsamic on the side.
Add the radish and continue to fry for a further 1 minute. Serve the hot noodles with the sliced avocado and torn mint and some balsamic on the side.
